name: challenge-22-redux-store
description: AS a senior engineer working on an e-commerce platform I WANT my platform to use Redux to manage global state instead of the Context API SO THAT my website's state management is taken out of the React ecosystem

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
